main: ^Can you tell me how to get inside of this building?
^I am just passing by, sorry. Bye
to_refinery: ^This is the refinery, this is  where inventions come to life and all plans for city improvements are tested, if you want to go through the door you need the code. Do you know it?
trade: ^I see that you do. Enjoy the laboratory inside but please do not disturb the scientists!
